Uses of Class
poised.Person

  • Uses of Person in poised

    Subclasses of Person in poised
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Architect
    Subclass to create an Architect object with information about the person responsible for designing the building project for Poised.
    class 
    Customer
    Subclass to create an Customer object with information about the person for which the Poise building project is being designed and constructed for.
    class 
    Engineer
    Subclass to create an Architect object with information about the person responsible for designing the building project for Poised.
    class 
    Manager
    Subclass to create a Manager object with information about the person responsible for managing the building projects for Poised.

    The 'getter' and 'setter' methods gets and sets the values of the customer, architect, engineer and engineer fields for the Architect, Customer, Engineer and Manager subclass objects.

    Methods in poised with parameters of type Person
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Person.capturePersonData(Person personType)
    Captures the fullname, contact number, email and address of an object from the respective subclass of the Person type.
    void
    Project.createProjectName(Project newPoiseProject, Person projectCustomer)
    Creates and sets a project name projName if the object feild is empty or equals to the "none" value initialised in the objects attributes.
    void

    Edits and recaptures the fullname, contact number, email and address of an object from the respective subclass of the Person type.
